text.tspan: Do NOT follow the common patterns of GUI(style, arrangement, etc.) like gtk+ or qt
The default theme should be dark. (If it don't support theming, it must be dark.)
Texts should be clear to see. So don't use an rgb(0,0,1) for foreground color of texts ans so on.
glfw: OpenGL window management and event processing.
GL[U]: OpenGL and OpenGL Utility Library
Menu bar can be hidden like this
